name: Bottom Bracket
description: The bottom bracket is held inside the part of the frame called the bottom bracket shell. With use, the bearings will wear out and require replacement.

name: Cassette
description: A fast and convenient tool to remove and install 12-spline Shimano®/SRAM® style cassette lockrings, as well as similar lockrings on rotor discs

name: Chain
description: To alleviate poor shifting and uneven drive train wear, manufacturers recommend chain replacement before rear cog replacement.
